#include<stdio.h>
int min(int a,int b)
{
	return (a < b ? a : b);
}
int main()
{
	int n,i,j,k,max_fuel,current_fuel,limit,t,l,input[65];
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--)
	{
		for(i = 1;i <= 64;i++)
			scanf("%d",&input[i]);
		i = 1;
		max_fuel = input[1];
		while(1)
		{
			printf("%d ",i);
			current_fuel = max_fuel;
			max_fuel = -1;
			if(i+current_fuel >= 64)
				break;
			limit = i+current_fuel;
			for(j = i+1;j <= limit;j++)
			{
				t = current_fuel + i + input[j] - j;
				if(t <= 5 && t - i + 5 + j >= max_fuel)
				{
					max_fuel = t - limit + j;
					l = t;
					k = j;
				}
			}
			i = k;
			max_fuel = l;
		}
		printf("64\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
